Name of the Product: A pre-fabricated home in a shipping container
Description of the Product: Who says you have to pay exorbitant broker fees to find the home of your dreams? You can make your dreams of homeownership come true as easily as you'd buy a bottle of dish soap, thanks to this storage-container-turned-house, available for a cool $36K.
Features of the Product: make your dreams of homeownership come true as easily as you'd buy a bottle of dish soap
